The performances of the original cast members who remain with the show have also deepened with detail...Benantiâ€™s independent Eliza removes the question that I felt looming over this production of 'My Fair Lady' when I saw it last April: Does the story still work if, as the director intends, we see no romantic feelings develop between Eliza and Henry Higgins?
